entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 7:49 PM CST Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:49 PM CST Tuesday 4 April 2023
